subject: RE: [junit] Re: Future of testing tools
msgSnippet: Hi David, ... Yes, that s exactly the case. Similar suggestions for inclusion were made at the session itself, but Kent only added those for which one or more
messageBody:
Hi David,

> > I noticed your map doesn't include CppUnit...
> > [...]
> > Is this because the group doesn't see C++ as a future language?
>
> I wasn't at the meeting, but I think the list given was
> simply of the tools who had representatives in the Pacific
> Northwest at the time.
> There was probably no editorial intent in inclusion or exclusion.

Yes, that's exactly the case. Similar suggestions for inclusion were
made at the session itself, but Kent only added those for which one or
more developers were present.

Charlie
